name: rrvfn
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ ℝ))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[Fn]⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1))

comment: A real-valued random variable is a function over the universe. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
